condition.narrative: Finance Agreement: HVEN Borrowing and Lending | Description: Unless the Bank shall otherwise agree, HVEN shall not incur anyindebtedness, or provide loans or grants, for purposes not related to HVEN's core business of providing transmission services. |Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: HVEN Current Ratio | Description: Starting in 2017, and except as the Bank otherwise agrees, HVEN shall maintaina ratio of current assets to current liabilities of not less than one. In each fiscal year, HVEN shall review, on the basis offorecasts satisfactory to the Bank, whether it would meet the current ratio of no less than one in such and the next fiscal year,and furnish to the Bank the results. | Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: HVEN Environmental Management Plans | Description: The Borrower shall ensure that HVEN shall carry out: Part1(a) of the Project in accordance with the HVEN Substation EMPs. | Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: HVEN Operational Manual | Description: HVEN shall adopt and carry out its Respective Parts of the Project inaccordance with the provisions of the HVEN Operational Manual. | Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: HVEN Subsidiary Agreement | Description: To facilitate the carrying out of HVEN’s Respective Parts of theProject, the Borrower shall make part of the proceeds of the Loan (the HVEN Subsidiary Loan) available to the HVEN under anagreement (the HVEN Subsidiary Agreement) between the Borrower and HVEN, under terms and conditions acceptable to the Bank. |Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: Hazardous Waste | Description: The Borrower shall ensure that HVEN and YTPC shall: (i) store any hazardous wasteunder the Project in accordance with the EMPs; (ii) prior to the disposal of such hazardous waste consult with the Bank; andthereafter (iii) dispose said hazardous waste, all in a manner acceptable to the Bank. | Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: YTPC Borrowing and Lending | Description: Unless the Bank shall otherwise agree, YTPC shall not incur anyindebtedness, or provide loans or grants, for purposes not related to YTPC's core business of providing Generation Services. |Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: YTPC Current Ratio | Description: Starting in 2017, and except as the Bank otherwise agrees, YTPC shall maintaina ratio of current assets to current liabilities of not less than one. In each fiscal year, YTPC shall review, on the basis offorecasts satisfactory to the Bank, whether it would meet the current ratio of no less than one in such and the next fiscal year,and furnish to the Bank the results. | Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: YTPC Environmental Management Plan | Description: The Borrower shall ensure that YTPC shall carry out Part 1(b)of the Project in accordance with the YTPC Substation EMP. | Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: YTPC Operational Manual | Description: HVEN shall adopt and carry out its Respective Parts of the Project inaccordance with the provisions of the YTPC Operational Manual. | Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: YTPC Safeguard Specialist | Description: The Borrower shall ensure that prior to the carrying out of anyactivity under Part 1(b) of the Project, YTPC shall hire an environmental safeguard specialist with qualifications and experience,and on terms and conditions satisfactory to the Bank. | Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Finance Agreement: YTPC Subsidiary Agreement | Description: To facilitate the carrying out of YTPC’s Respective Parts of theProject, the Borrower shall make part of the proceeds of the Loan (the YTPC Subsidiary Loan) available to the YTPC under anagreement (the YTPC Subsidiary Agreement) between the Borrower and YTPC, under terms and conditions acceptable to the Bank. |Frequency: CONTINUOUS

Percent of registered project related grievances (disaggregated by gender) responded to within stipulated service standards for response times
